events.text: Location: Stadion Galgenwaard, Utrecht
Remember, together #WePlayStrong. We're starting in a few minutes
Let the fun begin! Welcome to Euro 2017
Beautiful game so far
Up for the second half
What a goal by van de Sanden! Netherlands takes the lead
Unexpected, yet fully deserved win for the hosts!
Location: De Vijverberg, Doetinchem
The game is on!
Quick one for Denmark! Goal by Sanne Troelsgaard
Halftime. Denmark 1:0 Belgium
Second half is on
Tough win for Denmark
Location: Sparta Stadion Het Kasteel, Rotterdam
Italy and Russia are starting their way on this Euro
What a wonderful goal by Danilova!
Amazing start for Russia! Morozova scores
Powerful 45 minutes for the Russian team. They're close to winning their very first match on Euros.
Second half is on
Italy is back in the game! Goal by Mauro
Historic win for Russia
Location: Rat Verlegh Stadion, Breda
This is gonna be huge. Germany vs Sweden, starting now
Half-time. 0:0 so far
45 minutes to go
Full time. 0:0
Location: De Adelaarshorst, Deventer
Euro debutants, Austria and Switzerland, have started their game
Goal by Burger!
Half-time. Austria is leading, 1:0
Second half is on
First match on Euro, first win on Euro. Congratulations to Austria!
Location: Koning Willem II Stadion, Tilburg
The game is on
0:0 after first half
45 minutes left
Last minutes goal by Le Sommer
Full time. Three points goes to France
Location: De Vijverberg, Doetinchem
The first match of Group D
Goal by Losada after a wonderful assist
Sampedro doubles the score. 2:0
After the first half Spain is leading 2:0
The second half begins
That's it for this game
Location: Stadion Galgenwaard, Utrecht
The UK derby is live now!
Taylor scores!
Jodie Taylor shoves the ball into the net. 2:0!
Wow, that's 3:0! Ellen White scores
Half-time whistle. England leads with powerful 3:0 score
The second half begins
A hat-trick by Jodie Taylor!
They just won't stop. Nobbs makes it 5:0
Nobbs, 6:0
England has completely destructed their opponents
Thank you for using this app. This is the end of the first round. See you tomorrow!
Location: Rat Verlegh Stadion, Breda
Welcome to the round 2!
0:0 after the first half
The second half is on
Van Gorp scores!
And here is the second one! Goal by Cayman
Impressive win for Belgium
Location: Sparta Stadion Het Kasteel, Rotterdam
The game is on!
Goal from the penalty spot! Spitse is the author
Half time
The teams are ready to continue the game
This was a really tense game
Location: De Adelaarshorst, Deventer
The game has started
Lotta Schelin scores after a brilliant long pass
Sweden is leading 1:0 after the first 45 minutes
Second half is on
Blackstenius makes it 2:0
Full time
Location: Koning Willem II Stadion, Tilburg
The game has started!
Henning scores after an unlucky goalkeeper's mistake
The score is even! Goal by Mauro
Half-time. The score is 1:1
The second half is underway
Goal by Peter (penalty)
Red card for Bartoli (Italy)
Italy will be out of the tournament in case of defeat
Italy fought hard. After the red card, they did not give German team an easy way out. We saw a spectacular match today.
🇮🇹 Italy is out of the tournament. Let's thank them for the courage and the character they showed on the field
Location: De Vijverberg, Doetinchem
The game has started
What a goal for Iceland! Brilliant counter attack ends with an accurate strike from Fanndís Fridriksdóttir
And that's 1:1! Goal by Dickenmann
After the first half the score is even
The secon half is on
And now Switzerland's ahead! Bachmann scores
After eleven (eleven!) added minutes, the match is over
Location: Stadion Galgenwaard, Utrecht
The match has started
What a strike! Makas puts Austria ahead
Half-time
Second half
Equalizer by Henry
Full time, 1:1. A success for Austria, a setback for France
🇮🇸 After this draw, Iceland has no chances for playoffs. Iceland fought bravely and their fans are absolutely the best! Their best moments are definetely ahead
Location: Sparta Stadion Het Kasteel, Rotterdam
The game has started
Portugal is taking the lead! Goal by Carolina Mendes
Half-time
Second half is on
Scotland scores! What a goal by Cuthbert
And Portugal scores again! Goal by Ana Leite
Full time. Portugal wins, Scotland now has very little chances for outing
Location: Rat Verlegh Stadion, Breda
Off we go!
That was real quick! Goal by Kirby
Half-time
The second half is on
And that's second! Goal by Taylor
England wins another three points and tops Group D
Location: Koning Willem II Stadion, Tilburg

🇳🇱 Netherlands are through as group winners with a draw. They can only be knocked out if they lose to Belgium and Denmark win. Even then the Netherlands will be through if they lose by a one-goal margin other than 1-0 regardless of the Denmark score. If Belgium win 1-0 and Denmark win 1-0 then the Netherlands and Denmark will be split on disciplinary points, or then on coefficient, which favours Denmark. - UEFA.com

🇧🇪 Belgium are through with a win by any scoreline (even if they win 1-0 and Denmark win, Belgium would be at worst second due to overall goal difference or on head-to-head with the Netherlands). If Belgium win 1-0 and Denmark win 2-0 would mean disciplinary points, eventually coefficients to decide who finishes first and second. Belgium will be through with a draw if Denmark do not win. Belgium can afford to lose if Denmark lose by a margin of one or two goals (if Norway win by three and Belgium lose, Norway finish second). - UEFA.com
Spitse makes a huge step for Netherlands towards winning this group!
Half-time
Now to the second half
What a goal by Wullaert! Belgium is back in the race!
Goal by Martens. Belgium is on the brink again
Full time. Netherlands is finishing first, Belgium is most likely going home
🇧🇪 Denmark won their match, so Belgium is going home. Although they're out, they showed a great skill and courage. This team has a great future.
🇳🇱 Hosts won this group with an astonishing 9/9 points result. We saw a true mastery in their game, and now we're going to see it in the playoffs.
Location: De Adelaarshorst, Deventer
That's a quick goal! Veje is the scorer

🇩🇰 Denmark are through if they win only if Belgium do not win OR if Belgium win by a margin of two goals or more OR if Belgium win 1-0 and Denmark win by a scoreline other than 1-0. If Belgium win 1-0 and Denmark win 2-0 would mean disciplinary points, eventually coefficients to decide who finishes first and second. Denmark are through with a draw if Belgium lose or draw. Denmark are out if they lose. - UEFA.com
🇳🇴 Norway must win by a three-goal margin and hope Belgium lose if they want to reach the quarter-finals. - UEFA.com
That was the first half
Denmark is officially in the playoffs! Norway unexpectedly finishes last
🇳🇴 They tried, but, unfortunately, at this Euro Norway team did not show their best. They're going home, but this tournament will definetely make them stronger.
🇩🇰 Denmark fought hard, fought every minute of every match. They finished this group second, and now they're in the playoffs
Location: Stadion Galgenwaard, Utrecht
Start of the game. Russia needs victory, for Germany draw will be enough.
🇷🇺 Russia are through if they win and out with any other result. They top the group if they win and Sweden do not. - UEFA.com
Peter scores from the penalty spot

🇩🇪 Germany are through with a draw. If Germany lose, they need Sweden to also be beaten, when second place (meaning a game against Denmark rather than the Netherlsnds) will be decided by overall goal difference, then overall goals scored, then disciplinary. If all those things are level, Germany have the superior coefficient. - UEFA.com
Half-time
The second half is on.
Goal from Marozsán
Full time. Germany is going through.
🇷🇺 In this group, Russia needed to pull off a miracle to go through. The miracle did not happen. And although they lost to Sweden and Germany, they certianly did not let their fans down.
🇩🇪 Probably nobody is surprised by that. Germany, eight-time Euro winner, is finishing first in Group B.
Location: De Vijverberg, Doetinchem
A draw will work for Sweden, Italy is already out of chances.
Goal by Sabatino!

🇸🇪 Sweden are through with a draw or if Russia fail to win. If Sweden and Germany finish level on points they will be split on overall goal difference, then overall goals scored, then disciplinary. If all those things are level, Germany have the superior coefficient. - UEFA.com
Lotta Schelin equalises!
🇮🇹 Italy are out and will finish fourth in the group.
Italy is ahead again! Sabatino scores (again)
A very interesting game so far. Italy is showing real strength.
The second half is on.
And the score is even again! Goal by Stina Blackstenius
It ain't over yet! Girelli scores
Full time. The last moment of joy for Italian team.
🇸🇪 Sweden showed a decent skill in their game. They're finishing second in Group B and will face Netherlands in quarter-finals.
Location: Rat Verlegh Stadion, Breda

🇫🇷 France are through with a draw. If France lose, they need Austria to also be beaten, when second place will be decided by overall goal difference, then overall goals scored, the disciplinary. If all those things are level, France have the superior coefficient. - UEFA.com
🇨🇭 Switzerland are through if they win and out with any other result. They top the group if they win and Austria do not. - UEFA.com
Wow! That's a red card for Perisset (France)
Right after the red card for France, Crnogorčević scores with a beautiful header!
Half-time
Now to the second half
France is back! Abily equalises
France is going through!
🇨🇭 Switzerland was so close, but France is surely not an easy opponent. As for their first Euro, Swiss team showed a very decent game.
🇫🇷 Originally considered a favorite, France was on a brink of elimination. But the late goal by Camille Abily leads them to the quarter-finals.
Location: Sparta Stadion Het Kasteel, Rotterdam

🇦🇹 Austria are through with a draw or if Switzerland fail to win. If Austria and France finish level on points they will be split on overall goal difference, then overall goals scored, then disciplinary. If all those things are level, France have the superior coefficient. - UEFA.com
🇮🇸 Iceland are out and will finish fourth in the group. - UEFA.com
And that's a goal by Zadrazil!
Second goal for Austria! Burger scores
Half-time
Enzinger makes it 3:0
Austria is going to quarter-finals!
🇦🇹 Austria is a small surprise of this Euro. They showed themselves as fighters, and we're happy to see them in the quarter-finals!
Location: Koning Willem II Stadion, Tilburg
After a huge goalkeeper's mistake, Duggan scores

🇬🇧 England are through with a win, a draw or even a one or two-goal defeat, If England lose by three or more, they will be out if Spain win. If England lose 2-0 and Spain win, England would be at worst second ahead of Portugal on overall goal difference. - UEFA.com
And Portugal scores! Goal by Carolina Mendes. Though they still need to score at least once - only victory will put them through.

🇵🇹 Portugal are through with any win if Spain do not win. Portugal are definitely through if they win by three goals, or a two-goal margin other than 2-0. If Portugal win by one goal, they need Spain not to win. If Portugal win 2-0, they are through if Spain do not win or if Spain win 1-0. If Portugal win 2-0 and Spain win 2-1, they will be split on disciplinary points, or then on coefficient, which favours Spain. If Portugal draw, they need Spain to lose. If Portugal lose they are out. - UEFA.com
Half-time
The second half is on
Oh wow what a goal by Parris!
Full time
🇵🇹 Even though Scotland defeated Spain, Portugal needed at least a draw to move forward. Sadly, they did not get it. However, this was an incredible debut for this team.
🇬🇧 Without any doubt, England showed the best game in this group. They're going to the quarter-finals and will face France there.
Location: De Adelaarshorst, Deventer

Spain are through if they win unless Portugal beat England by a two-goal margin. If that result is 3-1, 4-2 etc, Spain cannot go through; if it is 2-0, Spain would be out if they won 1-0, or if they win 2-1 and are behind Portugal on disciplinary rankings. Spain are through with a draw if Portugal do not win. If Spain lose by one goal, they are through if Portugal lose. If Spain lose by two goals or more, they are out. - UEFA.com
Scotland must win by two goals and hope Portugal lose. - UEFA.com
That's a goal for Scotland! Weir scores
Half-time. Scotland must score at least one more to have a chance to proceed
Now to the second half
Scotland lacked one goal to go through. Spain is going to the quarter-finals
Scotland was so incredibly close. But the second goal did not happen, and so they're out of the competition. Their courage was huge, it was great to witness their game.
🇪🇸 Thanks to the Portugal loss, Spain is going to the quarter-finals!
Location: De Vijverberg, Doetinchem
The first quarter-final has started!
Goal by Martens!
1:0 after the first half
And that's another one! Miedema scores.
That's it for Sweden. Netherlands is going to semis!
Location: Sparta Stadion Het Kasteel, Rotterdam
Kick-off has been delayed until 21:00CET due to heavy rain. - UEFA.com
Kick-off has been delayed due to heavy rain. - UEFA.com
The game is postponed. The exact time will be reported later
Match postponed due to adverse weather conditions - UEFA.com
The UEFA Women's EURO 2017 quarter-final between Germany and Denmark in Rotterdam has been postponed to 12CET on Sunday due to heavy rain. - UEFA.com
The game has finally started
Goal by Kerschowski!
Half-time
Goal by Nadim!
Oh wow that's a goal by Theresa Nielsen! Denmark is really close to eliminating Germany, a.k.a. doing the impossible.
Well that's a front-pager. Germany is knocked-out. Denmark is going to semis, and Germany is going home without a trophy first time since 1995
Location: Koning Willem II Stadion, Tilburg
Here's the whistle
Half-time. 0:0 so far
Second half
FE Now we're going to extra time. Please make sure you have the latest version of the app.
ET 30 more minutes
PS Now to the penalty shoot-out
PH Goal (Feiersinger)
PA Goal (García)
PH Goal (Burger)
PA Goal (Sampedro)
PH Goal (Aschauer)
MA That's a miss! (Silvia Meseguer)
PH Goal (Pinther)
PA Goal (Corredera)
PH Goal (Puntigam)
Austria wins!

Penalties: 
🔹🔹🔹🔹🔹 Austria 5
🔹🔹🔸🔹◽️ Spain 3
Location: De Adelaarshorst, Deventer
Here we go!
Half-time
Goal by Jodie Taylor!
Full time. England will face Netherlands in the semi-final!
Location: Rat Verlegh Stadion, Breda
Here we go!
That's half-time
FE That's gonna be an extra time
ET
Second half of an extra time
PS Penalties!
PH Goal (Nadim)
MA Miss! (Feiersinger)
PH Goal (Harder)
MA Another miss! (Pinther)
MH Denmark misses! (Pedersen)
MA So unlucky for Austria (Aschauer)
PH Sørensen scores and Denmark wins!
What a drama. Denmark is finally going to the final, first time in their history.

Penalties: 
🔹🔹🔸🔹◽️ Denmark 3
🔸🔸🔸◽️◽️ Austria 0
Location: De Grolsch Veste, Enschede
The winner of this game will meet Denmark in the final
Miedema scores!
Here we go, the second half.
That's 2:0! Goal by Van de Donk
Own goal by Millie Bright
Netherlands is going to the final!
Location: De Grolsch Veste, Enschede
Welcome to the final game!
What a start! Nadim scores from the penalty spot
Now that's a response! Goal by Miedema
Goal by Martens!
Harder scores as a result of a beautiful counter-attack
Netherlands scores again! Goal by Spitse
That's a second goal by Miedema, and the score is now 4:2!
That's it, we have a new champion!
We are witnessing the rise of the new power in European women's football. Congratulations to the Netherlands team and all their supporters!
🇳🇱 Champions!
